title_job: AI Integration Consultant for AWS Bedrock
description:
We are seeking an experienced consultant to assist with the integration of AI using AWS Bedrock (at this point). The role involves assistance in both front-end and back-end consulting/development, as well as working with vector databases. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI technologies and cloud integrations, helping us to enhance our systems' capabilities effectively.

You will:

- Provide guidance on AI integration and architecture.
- Assist with front-end and back-end workflows.
- Step in as needed for specific challenges and future system expansions.

This is a mid- to long-term relationship based on an as-needed basis.
